name: Poo Evolution - Idle Cute Clicker Game Kawaii
name_original: Poo Evolution - Idle Cute Clicker Game Kawaii
description:
Poo Evolution - Idle Cute Clicker Game Kawaii is a casual game developed by Evolution Games.
Poo Evolution - Idle Cute Clicker Game Kawaii is available on Android. The game is sold via Google Play.
